# (TimeOfDayCategory)
# Usefulness: Grouping flights into semantic "times of day" (Early Morning, Morning, Afternoon, Evening/Night) can reveal distinct delay patterns. For example, early morning flights might be prone to fog delays, while afternoon/evening flights could suffer from accumulating delays due to congestion.
# Input samples: 'Time': [700.0, 1210.0, 735.0]
df['TimeOfDayCategory'] = pd.cut(df['Time'], 
                                   bins=[-1, 360, 720, 1080, 1440], 
                                   labels=[0, 1, 2, 3], 
                                   right=True, 
                                   include_lowest=True).astype(int)
